name: Ilans endless platformer
description:
Endless Platformer I made this 2D endless platformer, and was wondering if anyone would play it for testing and recommend stuff for the game. This is a very rough build (I have a lot to improve), so expect some bugs. Also, the UI is just for debugging and not final AT ALL. Controls

A & D, Move.

Space, Jump.

LeftShift, Dash.

DEBUG CONTROLS

I, Invincible.
L, Super-Speed.

There is double and triple jump if you have a buff.

If you have the time to play it, Please recommend some features and send them to Chips#1009 on discord. Thanks!
